title: Rapidfire cannon not working in TFT
body: RFC is not granting extra attack range in TFT, it's a gamebreaking bug that riot has to fix asap..

replies.body:
Yep, I agree. Draven is not getting the doubled range.
Tested with it attached by itself and with other items.

EDIT:
After playing more games, I've noticed RFC only works sometimes.
It is. Used it in my last game and had Draven attacking from across the map.
It is not, I played 4 games with it today and it did not work in any of them.
This is true, for me, it works sometimes and sometimes it doesn't. It literally has lost me games just because it ain't working
